Check your internet settings Next This field cannot be empty Prompt All progress will be lost Add I Know Invite Friends Create Group ` preview of media messages pending failed delivered seen sent no photo to display Loading… Taking care of few things… New Message "New message(s) from %s" Stay Never Disconnected! Select Your Country Don\'t have an account? Sign up! Already have an account? Log In! %s can\'t be empty Password too short Password too long "User names can only contain letters,underscore and digits and must be between 2 to 12 characters" "Group names can only contain letters and digits and must be between 5 to 30 characters" Enter a the code you received via SMS %s is not a valid phone number CLOSE Standard charges from your operator may apply New message(s) from " and " " others " "There is already a group with the name %s " now No message Failed to open image Sure you want to delete this conversation? All messages will be lost NO group Forward to… Enter a valid phone number Dissolve Phone Groups you share in common " Members" File is either too large or invalid Sure you want to leave group? all messages received from this group will be lost. busy Your country No name "Hello the following number is your verification code: " Message Invalid, Ensure the message does not exceed the size limit "Try out PairApp, an instant messenger for android. Using the app, I can share anything not only pictures and text.It\'s free and fast! \n Download here: https://pairapp.parseapp.com we are having trouble setting things up,ensure your are connected to the internet and that your date is correct @string/st_unable_to_connect 2/23/12 typingMessage … 12–12–12 play_or_download You are not yet a member of any group Invalid verification code Invite Today Yesterday Nothing to display Image size exceeds 8MB Invalid image Not a bitmap Add custom number You can add other users who are not in your contacts by adding their numbers directly.\n They only have to be registered members of PairApp. It\'s that simple! :-) New Message Type here… Name, e.g Brothers From One Hood remove attachment Send to… can\'t forward, file not found Unknown Listen,You currently don\'t have anyone in your \ contacts who uses PairApp.\n\n Quickly invite them to have a nice experience LISTEN, YOU CURRENTLY DON\'T HAVE ANYONE IN YOUR CONTACTS USING PAIRAPP.\n\n QUICKLY INVITE THEM FOR A NICE CHAT EXPERIENCE. @string/app_name Number added successfully. A group can start with minimum of 3 ( including you ) members You will be a member automatically after creating this group This number has already been added This user is already a member You are already a member Group names can only end with a letter Group names can only start with a letter Group names can not be less than 30 characters Group names can not be less than 5 characters Would you like to add the number in the text box before proceeding? writing… Image Pick an optional display picture for the group Camera Gallery names cannot contain the \"@\" character Later Add an optional display picture to help your friends recognise you Refreshing… Release to refresh Pull to refresh Refresh Contacts You seem to be permanently disconnected from the internet. Please Check your internet settings and try again Try Again Are you sure you want to use this picture as the DP?

Hi there! thanks for installing PairApp.
Please take a few seconds to set things up.

You are just an inch away from getting connected to your friends. Please take time to complete the set up process.

Picture Video File Silent SettingsActivity Feedback & Suggestions About PairApp Preferences An error occurred while processing the attachment. Try using a file manager to pick the file if the problem persists Restore defaults Title (optional) at most 40 letters Feedback Here Include System Information Submit Feedback body cannot be empty Feedback sent successfully. Thanks for your support and co-operation PAIRAPP © Hyper. © Hyper. LEGAL NOTICE Subject may not exceed 40 characters Silent Your phone number needs to be verified. This may incur operator charges, make sure you have a working SMS plan before you continue. Continue Sure you want to permanently dissolve this group? This action cannot be undone. Document Text file Application Presentation Archive Audio message Download failed Downloading Downloaded Upload progress You\'ve reached maximum number of parallel downloads, you may wait for other downloads to complete Add to contacts Click to download update Update available Google play services is either absent or outdated.Some functionality may be limited Your google play services is not up to date, you may consider updating to the latest version Invite through Crop Cancel Suggestions,feature requests,bug reports,… Failed to save image, there might be no/insufficient storage on your device Search Add Number too short Cropped image is too short compared to its width Cropped image is too narrow Cropped Image too big This is strange!, No contact application is installed on your device Block %s Unblock %s this user Don\'t ask me again Failed to load image, your device might have run ouf of RAM stop annoying me retry sending message Retry sending message By sending a message to this blocked user, you agree that this user will be automatically unblocked unblocked successfully Deleted successfully blocked successfully un-muted muted Mute %s Un-mute %s failed to attach file attachment added maximum of 5 attachments can be added per report Delete message verification failed already downloading uploading The message you selected was not found, did you delete it? Token is not valid,Check your SMS inbox for the token.
